item.description:
Checked out this place many times great view of Newburyport and the Harbor, Mouth Watering Martinis, and oysters on the half to shuckle down, oh yeah they make a good mouth watering mixed drink as well. They have a huge variety of menu options so you will not walk away disappointed trust me!!!

Acoustic Music for this Night: AJ Edward 5-8pm

Upstairs they have a huge deck, large indoor bar, flatscreens and a room to kick back and sink into soft leather couches, come on where else can you find such beautiful ambience,,,parking is abundant, if you want to venture out there are plenty of after hour dance clubs we can check out later. I will get there around 6pm to meet and greet upstairs in the lounge area, any one want to join me for dinner get there early and grab a few spots for the group. This is a nice relaxing way to start off the week end.
item.name: Scenic Newburyport Dinner Accentuated with Acoustic Music
